original_title: En la ciudad de la furia
overview: Three stories set on the most dangerous city in the world, Monterrey MÃ©xico:  Max, a hit man from the mob, hunts a guy named Jesus, who is an ex killer looking for redemption; Belinda, a wedding photographer, lives with a man who thinks is a dog; and Roberto, a videographer, who gets involved with the mob.
title: In the City of Fury
